All features: SRS-XV500
The power to party anywhere

Grab the SRS-XV500 wireless party speaker and take the party wherever you go. This speaker packs powerful sound, built-in lighting2 and a long-lasting battery3—you can even plug in a karaoke mic and sing the night away. With the XV500, you have everything you need to entertain your friends and family.
LIVE LIFE LOUD

Life should be lived at full volume. That means getting your friends together, turning up the music and dancing all night to clear, rich sound. With our X-series wireless speakers, you can make the most of every single moment, power parties you'll remember for ever, and always live your life out loud.
Sony brings you closer to the music and the artists you love. Watch exclusive videos and enter to win prizes only available for Sony fans.
AT A GLANCE
All your favorite features in the box
Powerful sound you can carry around
Entertain your audience
All it takes is a touch
Enjoy powerful sound with a clear and deep bass from a speaker that you can move around. And with a long-lasting battery, you can party long into the night.
With inputs for karaoke and guitar, the SRS-XV500 gives you even more ways to have a good time. Just plug in and sing or play.
An intuitive, illuminated touch control panel makes it easy to control your speaker2 and to find your perfect settings, even in dark environments.
Powerful Party Sound anywhere

Take the party wherever you go with the SRS-XV500 speaker. It has a powerful sound thanks to the X-Balanced Speaker Unit, a long-lasting battery3 and an easy to carry handle, so you can have a great sound experience indoors or outside.
Powerful Party Sound
The SRS-XV500 uses woofers and front tweeters to deliver a deep, punchy bass and clear vocals. With even more sound pressure, you won't be able to resist the urge to dance.
Powerful sound with X-Balanced Speaker Unit
A richer, clearer, deeper experience

Our X-Balanced Speaker Unit features an almost rectangular diaphragm, for an increased surface area compared to conventional speaker units. The 140 mm x 140 mm large woofer unit gives clear and deep bass sound.

The non-circular diaphragm not only maximizes the area of speaker diaphragm, but it also increases sound pressure for deeper and punchier bass, less distortion and greater vocal clarity. For a richer, clearer, and more rewarding listening experience.
Listen loud and clear
The combination of X-Balanced Speaker Units and front High-efficiency Tweeters deliver powerful, rich, and crisp sound. That means everyone can experience great music.
LIVE SOUND
Give your bass a boost
The LIVE SOUND mode is perfect for live music, so the XV500 lets you relive your favorite sound experiences.
Activate MEGA BASS to give your bass a boost and listen to your favorite tracks with the power they deserve.
The party never stops
With up to 25-hour battery life, the XV500 will keep the party powered all night.3
Power up in just 10 minutes
Get up to 2.5 hours of playing time with just a 10-minute charge.3
Take care of your battery
The Battery Care function protects your speaker from overcharging, make it more dependable over time.4
Grab it and go
The XV500 has comfortable handles that make carrying it easy.
The choice is yours
The XV500 can be positioned horizontally or vertically, depending on your needs.
Don't stop your party
If the forecast isn't looking good, you don't have to worry. The XV500 has an IPX4 water resistant rating,8 so you can play outside with confidence, even if a few raindrops fall.
Mood lighting and stylish design
The speaker's indirect, ambient lighting suits the mood of any surroundings. Its simple, clean design blends into any room.
Sing in your style

To belt out your favorite song, simply plug in a karaoke mic and press play. The Echo and Key Control on the rear panel of the unit let you adjust sound to your preference. And there is a second input too, so you can duet with a friend on a second mic or even plug in a guitar to ramp things up even further.
Inputs and settings in one place
The inputs and controls are all found on the rear panel, including those for Echo and Key Controls. Designed for convenience, so you can sound your best.
Stay in control of your settings
Take control of your modes, settings, and lighting with the easy-to-use touch panel. It's intuitive and conveniently illuminated, so you can command the party even in a dark environment.
Bluetooth® Fast Pair
Pair your Android™ device and the XV500 with just a quick tap.6
Party Connect
Connect with up to 100 compatible speakers and sync your music and lights to make sure everyone's dancing to the same beat.2
Play music & charge devicesvia USB
Plug in and play music via USB and use the XV500 to charge other devices.7
Personalize your sound with the Sony | Music Center app​
Control the XV500 from your mobile device. With the Sony | Music Center app, you can optimize audio settings, select playlists, cue the next song, and control Party Connect.2

Environment in mind
Aiming to achieve a zero environmental footprint

Inspired by the beauty of the world, we are doing our part to help preserve the Earth while still offering a superior sound and listening experience. With a goal of achieving a zero environmental footprint across the entire Sony Group by the year 2050, we are accelerating numerous initiatives for the environment.
Sustainability in mind

Our products are designed not only to offer outstanding sound quality, but also to be kind to the environment. Recycled plastic1 originally developed for Sony is partially used for the body of the SRS-XV500. This reflects how Sony strives to reduce the environmental impact of our products.
Accessibility

We believe technology should make the world more interactive, more creative, more entertaining, and more inclusive. By incorporating human-centric, inclusive design into our audio products, we deliver our Kando experience to all our users, regardless of age, ability or environment.

Our X-Balanced Speaker Unit features an almost rectangular diaphragm, for an increased surface area compared to conventional speaker units. The 140 mm x 140 mm large woofer unit gives clear and deep bass sound.

The non-circular diaphragm not only maximizes the area of speaker diaphragm, but it also increases sound pressure for deeper and punchier bass, less distortion and greater vocal clarity. For a richer, clearer, and more rewarding listening experience.
The LIVE SOUND mode is perfect for live music, so the XV500 lets you relive your favorite sound experiences.
Activate MEGA BASS to give your bass a boost and listen to your favorite tracks with the power they deserve.
XV500 Travel Backpack: Introducing the new XV500 Travel Backpack, designed for portability and convenience.  Access all speaker functions and enjoy clear sound without the hassle of removing it from the bag.  Built with RuggedGuard 600D material and cross-stitched reinforcements for superior durability, this versatile bag seamlessly converts between a duffle and a backpack. Take your party anywhere, hassle-free.
